# Proof of Authority Commands

## Setup

To begin testing these commands you will need to set defaults.

Run the following command and set each of the configuration attributes to the
desired values.

```bash
evmlc config set -i

? Host 127.0.0.1
? Port 8080
? From 0xA4a5F65Fb3752b2B6632F2729f17dd61B2aaD650
? Gas 100000000
? Gas Price 0
? Keystore [home_dir]/.evmlc/keystore
```

The default `from` address will be the account used to sign transactions for any
POA commands.

## Nominate

This command can be used to nominate an `address` to be put through elections.

### Usage

```bash
evmlc poa nominate --pwd <password> --nominee <address> --moniker <moniker>
```

### Return

```json
{"root":"0x6b7ca84f9a4984ac2d47394b3112d1f248ca7d46d0caf8b6dd59d49b4df0133b","transactionHash":"0x29aa57271e747192b0dc5108495a4efa52d40b6d3dcba1cb31d6d90434693745","from":"0xa4a5f65fb3752b2b6632f2729f17dd61b2aad650","to":"0xf213fad3daab5b18c19c36117bf6174249f6c214","gasUsed":22104,"cumulativeGasUsed":22104,"contractAddress":"0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","logs":[],"logsBloom":"","status":0}
```
